entry.title: Hexo
entry.content: 快速、简洁且高效的博客框架官网 特点超快速度Node.js 所带来的超快生成速度，让上百个页面在几秒内瞬间完成渲染。 支持 MarkdownHexo 支持 GitHub Flavored Markdown 的所有功能，甚至可以整合 Octopress 的大多数插件。 一键部署只需一条指令即可部署到 GitHub Pages, Heroku 或其他网站。 丰富的插件Hexo 拥有强大的插件系统，安装插件可以让 Hexo 支持 Jade, CoffeeScript。 12345$ npm install hexo-cli -g$ hexo init blog$ cd blog$ npm install$ hexo server

entry.title: Kubernetes_Nginx-Ingress
entry.content: For example12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1kind: Ingressmetadata: annotations: nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: 'true' #代表其中跳转 nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/service-weight: '' nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: 'true' creationTimestamp: '2018-12-25T10:29:36Z' generation: 1 name: boss namespace: default resourceVersion: '21429383' selfLink: /apis/extensions/v1beta1/namespaces/default/ingresses/boss uid: fa56e2a0-082f-11e9-80cf-00163e0e2421spec: rules: - host: boss1.vcg.com http: paths: - backend: serviceName: node-vcg-boss servicePort: 80 path: / tls: - hosts: - boss1.vcg.com secretName: vcg-httpsstatus: loadBalancer: ingress: - ip: 39.97.21.16

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
